RECOMMENDED ACTIVITIES: After Breakfast - Local Sight Seeing, Garuda Vishnu Park , Tanha Lot
Ulluwatu Temple in First Half . (Towards South Bali)
Tanha Lot Temple in the evening - (Sunset is awesome here !)
If travelling by cab , Can book local taxis for a day - Many offline options available in KUTA or can go for GOJEK, GRAB (Which is like ola Uber)
